member.summary: Adds an empty curve to the end of the axis

member.summary: Sets the screen Facor for the X axis (the factor between screen and reality)

member.summary: Returns or sets the axis's Color

member.summary: Returns or sets the axis's curve-array

member.summary: Returns or sets the axis's Type (use AxisType)

member.summary: Returns or sets the axis's visibility

member.summary: Returns or sets the axis's selection-state

member.summary: Returns the axis's total duration (X-Max)

member.summary: Returns the minimal Y value of all curves in this axis

member.summary: Returns the maximal Y value of all curves in this axis

member.summary: Returns x-screen factor

member.summary: Returns y-screen factor

member.summary: Makes the segment of the first selected point completely flat

member.summary: Removes the last segment of all selected Axes but not if there is only one segement left

member.summary: Returns the currently selected Axis. Returns Nothing if no axis is selected.

member.summary: Returns the currently selected Axis. Returns Nothing if no axis is selected.

member.name: P:mEStudio.My.Resources.Resources.about_info
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to miniEngine Stusio is a Windows client for the miniEngine motion-control-system. It allows creating multi-key-frame motor-paths using Bézier curves for precise motion-control set-ups on multiple axes.
Author: Airic Lenz .
